import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function ContactUs() { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", service: "", message: "", }); const services = [ "Corporate Catering", "Packed Meals", "Event Catering", "Festival Menus", "Tuck Shops", "Pop-Up Counters", ]; const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("Form submitted! (Backend integration pending)"); }; return (
